name: fantastic rabbits pictures for kids - free
name_original: fantastic rabbits pictures for kids - free
description:
This game is made especially for children. The difficulty and its graphics are suitable for a young audience (under 8). This application is composed of two different games:

first game:
In this game, your child will be keen to show and also skillful. Targets appear and you must hit them throwing a dart. Please do not use all your darts. To win the level your child should exceed the score to beat. Playable with one or two players. When a level is successful rabbit image becomes available in the image gallery.

second game:
In this game your child will make cakes. He catches on a treadmill the different elements necessary to create the cake. To win your child will be the fastest possible. When a level is successful rabbit image becomes available in the image gallery.

Characteristics :
- Gameplay adapted to children.
- Universe suitable for children on the theme of rabbits.
- Three difficulty levels.
- Simple interface suitable for children.
- 2 different games available.
- 2 possible players on one device.
- 40 pictures of rabbits to release.

the following languages ​​are available:
Albanian, English, Basque, Catalan, Croatian, Danish, Spanish, Estonian, French, Finnish, Galician, Welsh, Hungarian, Indonesian, Irish, Icelandic, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malay, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovene, Slovak, Swedish, Tagalog, Czech, Turkish, Finnish, Maltese.
